snippet: Imports to most countries plunged when the credit crisis began in 2008, and then recovered. But in recent months, slowing economies have led to renewed declines in most countries in the euro zone.
lead_paragraph: Imports to most countries plunged when the credit crisis began in 2008, and then recovered. But in recent months, slowing economies have led to renewed declines in most countries in the euro zone.

headline.main: Off the Charts: Imports Are Falling, Again
headline.seo: Off the Charts: Imports Are Falling, Again
